channel.title: Git Snippets on Bas-Man's Ponderings
channel.description: Recent content in Git Snippets on Bas-Man's Ponderings

item.description: Change lastmod for Hugo when lastmod is based on git commit stackoverflow - re-write git commit time git filter-branch -f --env-filter \ 'if [ $GIT_COMMIT = 9fb407b47803c201725fd02c1a7406c93e5cad42 ] then export GIT_AUTHOR_DATE="Sun May 10 00:00:00 2020 +0900" export GIT_COMMITTER_DATE="Sun May 10 01:00:00 2020 +0900" fi' Don’t forget to use –force when pushing upstream.
